## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G18520](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G18520)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>7TM1, CAND7</u>
- **Gene Name:** candidate G-protein Coupled Receptor 7
- **Description:**   Lung seven transmembrane receptor family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2146233
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [7tm1-1 7tm5-1 ]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced hypocotyl growth, thicker hypocotyls when grown in presence of isoxaben. Reduced cellulose.
